setting.label: File extensions
setting.help: Comma-separated list of video file extensions to include in playlists.

setting.label: Exclude words
setting.help: Comma-separated list of words/patterns to exclude from playlist filenames.

setting.label: Exclude folders (comma separated)
setting.help: Comma-separated list of folder names to exclude from scanning.

setting.label: Minimum file size (MB)
setting.help: Minimum file size (in MB) to include.

setting.label: Maximum file size (MB)
setting.help: Maximum file size (in MB) to include.

setting.label: Scan subfolders
setting.help: Enable scanning of subfolders within the selected base folder.

setting.label: Minimum File Date
setting.help: Include files newer than this date.

setting.label: File sort method
setting.help: Method used to sort files within a playlist.

setting.label: Folder sorting
setting.help: Method used to sort folders before processing.

setting.label: Custom folder order (comma separated)
setting.help: Comma-separated list of folder names for custom sorting.

setting.label: Number of newest files to prioritize
setting.help: Number of newest files to include from each folder, if applicable.

setting.label: Limit mode
setting.help: Determines how the file limit is applied.

setting.label: Files per folder
setting.help: Maximum number of files to include per folder (if 'Per folder' limit mode).

setting.label: Total files
setting.help: Maximum total number of files to include in the playlist (if 'Total files' limit mode).

setting.label: Show folder names
setting.help: Display folder names in the playlist entries.

setting.label: Show metadata
setting.help: Display additional metadata (e.g., file size, duration) in playlist entries.

setting.label: Show duration
setting.help: Display media duration in playlist entries.

setting.label: Enable Context Menu Download
setting.help: Enables the 'Download' option in the context menu for playable items.

setting.label: Download Path
setting.help: Default path to save downloaded files.

setting.label: Enable Regular Filename Cleanup
setting.help: Apply cleaning rules to regular filenames.

setting.label: Remove Words
setting.help: Words (pipe-separated) to remove from filenames.

setting.label: Switch Words (old=new|...)
setting.help: Words to replace (e.g., 'old=new|another=different').

setting.label: Use Regex Replace
setting.help: Enable regex for advanced filename replacement.

setting.label: Regex Pattern
setting.help: Regex pattern to search for.

setting.label: Regex Replace With
setting.help: String to replace matched regex pattern with.

setting.label: Enable Adult Content Download Settings
setting.help: Separate settings for adult content downloads.

setting.label: Adult Download Path
setting.help: Path to save adult content downloads. Overrides regular path.

setting.label: Enable Adult Filename Cleanup
setting.help: Apply cleaning rules to adult content filenames.

setting.label: Adult Content Remove Words
setting.help: Words (pipe-separated) to remove from adult content filenames.

setting.label: Adult Content Switch Words (old=new|...)
setting.help: Words to replace in adult content filenames.

setting.label: Use Adult Regex Replace
setting.help: Enable regex for advanced adult content filename replacement.

setting.label: Adult Regex Pattern
setting.help: Regex pattern to search for in adult content filenames.

setting.label: Adult Regex Replace With
setting.help: String to replace matched regex pattern with in adult content filenames.
